website_summaries.verdict: Get lips that feel as good as they look with this hydrating gloss.
pros: Color is pigmented with a high gloss finish
Includes agave and moringa oils to keep lips hydrated
Applicator picks up the perfect amount of gloss and is easy to work with
cons: Some find the color is too sheer for them

customer_reviews.title: Popping 👄
customer_reviews.text: I got the Super Natural lipgloss. I was expecting a nude color when it said natural but it is pink in color, but when I put it on my lips it’s matches perfectly I love it because It makes my lips pop, very natural looking, it’s not sticky, and it’s moistures my lips .. I will definitely buy more
customer_reviews.author: Danni

customer_reviews.title: Not sticky! Pretty color.
customer_reviews.text: I’m surprised I like it so much. I was not expecting it to not be sticky, which is what stops me from buying glosses. This one is amazing. Not sticky, fine glitter and subtle color so my lips look natural in pigment. I recommend this Snow Pink color and more. I’ll probably buy more colors. It can last longer if you’re not eating or drinking.
customer_reviews.author: TianaPix

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the color, “Desert Spice.” In my opinion, it’s a really pretty reddish-pink color. This lipgloss is one of my favorite lipglosses in the lower price range. It’s not greasy, but I do have to reapply it every couple hours. I do love that the color is really pigmented. I’d buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, inexpensive!
customer_reviews.text: I bought Rosy Future as an alternative to Fenty Beauty's Gloss Bomb (per a YouTube video!). Much cheaper and I really like it. Looks great when applied over a lip pencil. Just enough color and shine, which is what I wanted. Easy to apply, not sticky, lips are moist. Also bought one for a friend. Got this just before the price went up but would still purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Renee

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Does the job. Not too thick. I wear invisalign so I'm sorry for the goofy smiles. I bought the super natural color and it blends right in with my natural lip color
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne Grayce Music

customer_reviews.title: easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: I found Super Natural to be too dark for me. However the lipgloss has great staying power, is not sticky and easy to apply. The gloss seems fairly hydrating. I actually did not notice that the lip gloss gave a slight illusion that my lips were marginally larger. There is an array of colours to choose from and think I will be sticking with light pink hues.
customer_reviews.author: Antares

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Mauve/Nude Gloss
customer_reviews.text: Love this gloss. It is my everyday lip gloss. It can be worn alone or with a brown lip liner. It replaced an expensive brand of a similar color! I have several back ups because it is normally sold out in stores.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: ... flashy than expected but all in all not to disappointed, easy to use even as someone who doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: The sparkle was a bit more flashy than expected but all in all not to disappointed, easy to use even as someone who doesn't use lip-gloss/stick often (pretty much ever).
customer_reviews.author: Ember Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: FAB!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is fabulous, lovely natural tint, lots of shine but with no glitter. Beautiful gloss and not too sticky, I actually went back and purchased two more!
customer_reviews.author: shoegirl23

customer_reviews.title: Rosy Future- a Good Basic Gloss
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice basic $6 gloss; if it was a $20 gloss this would get 3 stars. It’s not drying and not super sticky or gloppy. It’s also not super highly pigmented so it’s somewhere between a regular gloss and a tinted Gloss. My pics are showing the Color rosy future
customer_reviews.author: ReviewMistress

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Color.  Fast Shipping.  Not Long Lasting ....
customer_reviews.text: (my wife is writing this review) Fast Delivery! This is a nice lip gloss. You can feel confident to apply it without a mirror. But, it is not long lasting at all. I constantly reapply it. I will continue to buy it as it's pretty (shiny). I've probably used 6 or 7 of these already. I can keep reapplying, not a big deal for me.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Nice lilac lip gloss
customer_reviews.text: I pretty much only use Revlon Super Lustrous lip gloss, because it’s affordable, and I like the applicator. I purchased this one because I was curious about the color. It’s actually very light lilac once applied. I do feel I need to reapply frequently but it moisturizes quite well. There is no flavor or fragrance. The price was extremely fair and this color could not be found in local stores. I would probably buy this color again, or use it as a topper for a purple or amethyst shade of lipstick.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Where's the color!!??
customer_reviews.text: I bought the color "Blissed out" thinking it would be colorful and shimmery, like the pictures, but when I opened it up and tried it on I was Very Disappointed. There's very little color to it at all, and it's not nearly as shimmery as I was hoping for. It Felt like a let down, especially from a brand like Revlon.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: MUST BUY!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for all lipgloss lovers! Pigmented very glossy not sticky but tacky enough to hold on. I bought 3 shades dessert spice, rosy future, and blissed out. All super wearable. If you are only wanting to buy one to test it out for you buy rosy future it’s super wearable for any setting. Dessert spice is a reddish color that would be good for those who don’t feel confident enough to wear a true red because their teeth aren’t white enough (me). The blissed out is a true subtle pink has a gold glitter sheen to it that I might wear going out- almost reminds me of a color Jessica Simpson would wear!
customer_reviews.author: Bryce

customer_reviews.title: High-shine gloss; pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by this product. I needed something for my lips in a rush, so I ordered this on a whim. One coat ended up lasting all afternoon. It’s very occlusive on the lips, and has a lot of reflective shine in one coat — sometimes TOO much shine, but nothing a quick blot won’t fix. It also has a nice, sheer, warm peach color payoff, which pairs well with my deep-dark skin. I will be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I had already bought a couple of the Solar Coral about a year or so ago (love it as well) and just purchased the Super Natural. It's a great neutral color that seems like it would work for many different people. It's not long lasting, but it's a lip gloss so it's not supposed to be. It is very moisturizing. The only thing I noticed from my older version is that the wand is larger now. I wonder if that is why some complain the tip was missing???
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa C

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for friends
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my friend as a gift. She loves it! She calls it her special occasion gloss. Lol It’s very pretty and last awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Logan

customer_reviews.title: The Lean in is a beautiful color, lighter than shown, and prettier than expected.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a Nars's lip gloss dupe (Orgasm), this is a magnificent option. It is rich, glossy and goes on evenly, no gaps in coverage, not sticks, just a real nice application without stickiness, it feels expensive and it is long lasting. I am very happy with it, the color is lighter than shown, which is exactly what I needed, as I mostly use it as a topper/finisher touch. It will go well with nudes, naturals as well as deeper and brighter shades.
customer_reviews.author: M. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with this lip gloss!
customer_reviews.text: I tried lip gloss years ago and it was sticky and yukky and didn't last at all. I also am allergic to certain ingredients, the natural ones (almond, coconut, etc.). I've tried a couple of lipsticks with disappointing results, so I decided to try a lip gloss again. I didn't want to spend a lot of money and I didn't want a set, one basic color is good for me. I ordered this with misgivings but I like it! I have no problem with any ingredients, it's reasonably priced and it's a good color for me. I'm very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. D in TN

customer_reviews.title: I am hooked!
customer_reviews.text: I love this and literally cannot do without it. I have been wearing this for about four months and I am in love. It looks very nice on my lips and stays on for several hours without coming off. I am pleased with this very pretty lip gloss.
customer_reviews.author: STILL KEEPING IT 100.

customer_reviews.title: Actually CLEAR! Not a creative name!
customer_reviews.text: I like these glosses but crystal clear looks frosted or metallic in all the pictures. It doesn't say anywhere I saw that this had NO PIGMENT in it at all it is LITERALLY CLEAR. I thought it was a name. I never wanted a clear one and wouldn't have bought this if I knew that at the time.
customer_reviews.author: erika case

customer_reviews.title: pretty much perfect
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this lipgloss is great. It’s not too sticky and it doesn’t dry my lips out, which is a MIRACLE because pretty much every other lip color product does. That alone will make me want to try more colors. This is the perfect level of sheer red where it brings color to your lips, but not in the same way as a full coverage lip gloss. it really doesn’t smell like or taste like anything. My new favorite gloss !
customer_reviews.author: AmazonAddict

customer_reviews.title: Dupe for the Fenty Glow Lipgloss
customer_reviews.text: I got my friend into the perfection that is the Fenty lipgloss (thank you Rhianna) but given it's price point, was hoping to find an alternative. She recommended I try this one after we heard it was a good dupe and I'm pleasantly surprised. I'd give this 4.5 out of 5 stars - just not super long-lasting (but what non-supersticky lipgloss is?). Definitely reco giving this a try!
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: My favorite gloss!
customer_reviews.text: This doesn't dry my lips out and isn't gross and sticky like other glosses. It is a VERY light hint of color and just the right amount of gloss and sparkle to make your lips look more youthful without being a disco ball. It's very comfortable to wear and one dip is enough for my whole mouth. The smell is subtle and pleasing. Highly recommend if you're looking for a subtle improvement for your lips so you look more put together.
customer_reviews.author: talijane

customer_reviews.title: Sucky New Applicator!!!!!!!÷! Why
customer_reviews.text: Why did you change the perfectly fine applicator!!!?? It takes up more room which means less lip gloss also I have been buying this same product for 3 years and I'm so disappointed in the new applicator please change it back or i will stop buying and endorsing this product
customer_reviews.author: Tiburcio Quintanilla

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Rosy Future - lovely color. On me not very pigmented. Still love it though. Not sticky. Love the oversized angled applicator. Great price and great amount of product. Going back for more colors. Doesn't last very long on me but most lip glosses don't. Love the shine. No funky smell. Not goopy or gloppy. Makes my lips feel soft and moisturized. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: amazonshopper

customer_reviews.title: MEH...
customer_reviews.text: I was not a fan of this that much. It is not as dark as I expected. This is so light that it is almost like a clear gloss. I thought it was going to be a nude gloss but there is barely any color to it. It's basically your average clear lip gloss. It's really nothing special that I just have to have or use everyday.
customer_reviews.author: AliciaTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Awful!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased Rose Quartz after looking at the color swatches. The color seemed to be a pretty medium pink. In actuality it looks Barbie pink in the tube with glitter. On my lips, it's just a clear mess of glitter. Perhaps something a little girl would like, basically looks like toy makeup. It also had an awful smell to it, went straight in the trash!
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Pretty lip gloss!
customer_reviews.text: It's a very pretty lip gloss!! It isn't too sticky, really no flavor at all. The gloss came sealed. It's not AS red as it looks in the container, which I'm 100% okay with, because I was worried it would be a little too much.
customer_reviews.author: AmyL

customer_reviews.title: Applicator not long enough to use complete product
customer_reviews.text: I like this product but as most cosmetics, the applicator is manufactured intentionally shorter than the bottom of the container. You will leave at least 1/2 inch in the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Total let down
customer_reviews.text: I’m a sucker for a pinky nude gloss & I bought this because the price was right & the reviews looked decent, so I had high hopes for this. However, every time I have used it, I get that disgusting white goopy ring around the inside of my lips after having it on only a few minutes. GROSS!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Marie H

customer_reviews.title: Misleading color illustration.
customer_reviews.text: Color is completely unlike shown in the tube; very washed out. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Average Consumer

customer_reviews.title: of it looks too good to be true... than it most likely is!
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed because I thought it was a great deal because they are cheaper here than at a makeup store (Ulta, CVS, Walgreens etc) by half but it’s not the same it looks like it but the gloss itself isn’t real shiny and it doesn’t stay on not at all. I am very disappointed! I guess you get what you pay for 😔
customer_reviews.author: AnGie McKenna the expert shopper

customer_reviews.title: ❤️ Prettiful ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I don’t wear lipstick 💄 much anymore. I love 💕 Revlon’s Super Lustrous The Gloss in Dusk Darling #275. It not only has a nice color, it stays on for hours and is moisturizing on my lips. I also like that it gives a little bit of shimmer or glitter. Even old women my age likes to feel pretty. 💋 👵
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: My go-to lip gloss
customer_reviews.text: My usual lip routine is to apply a long wearing lip color followed by a lip gloss. The long wearing formulas tend to dry out my lips but the color remains so a lip gloss helps keep my lips moisturized. The Revlon Super Lustrous in Pinkissimo is a good everyday gloss that I can wear over pinks, corals and nudes. This is one of the few lip products I actually use up before tiring of. Glad I can keep this on Subscribe and Save.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonFan

customer_reviews.title: Too sticky
customer_reviews.text: I loove the color and love the brand that I have bought for so many years but this particular one is a little too sticky for me and I am not impressed with the color, it doesn't go on as well as it looks in the bottle. I also have aa very hard time getting it off my lips once it is on. But I do like the flavor of it unlike most of them that I have tried this one doesn't taste disgusting when it hits my taste buds.
customer_reviews.author: Brailey Stone

customer_reviews.title: Nice shine
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a dupe for a Fenty beauty lipgloss. It’s sheer enough but gives a nice sheen and shine to your lips. I use it on top of my lipstick as well.
customer_reviews.author: Dowisetrepla

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected...
customer_reviews.text: When I was purchasing this, I would it would be a nice , natural pink color since that is show the image led me to believe. When I bought it, it was clear. I did not think that it would be a clear color. I thought it would be the light pink color that was seen in the photo. There is no scent which is nice since there is no chemical smell to it. It is something comfortable to wear or layer on with a lipstick or another lipgloss that worn with it. I would recommend it for the price value and if you wanted to buy something that is comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Sakia Quayum

customer_reviews.title: It is such a pretty peachy nude lipglosswith sparkles but its soo pretty
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Rosy Future. I've been really into lipgloss lately, and the only reason I got this was because I saw it on Adrienne Bailon's amazon list and I decided to get it. It is such a pretty peachy nude lipglosswith sparkles but its soo pretty. The smell isn't great but you'll fall in mlove with the color.
customer_reviews.author: Abby

customer_reviews.title: Great neutral lip gloss
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a different shade in this line and the second color is just as dependable as the first. There is no stickiness or weird taste from the gloss. It is the perfect shade of neutral for my skin tone without looking at all overdone. I've used a pale brown lipstick and then this over, and the result was great too.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Stagner

customer_reviews.title: Nice, smooth & lightly pigmented & scented.
customer_reviews.text: Love this lip gloss! There’s barely a scent but it does have a light vanilla scent. Not sticky and lightly pigmented, which is what I want from a gloss. I got the Super Natural color & it gives a nice natural nude-pink color to my lips to give them a little more life. I was a little sketched out buying lip gloss from amazon but when I was opening it, it was easy to tell it was brand new: there was no gloss at or around the rim and once I used it, there was (if that makes sense).
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I really don't like lip gloss , but this is not sticky like other lip glosses, it has a nice consistency , it doesn't wear as well as i would like , the colors are amazing. Please make more colors for fall. thanks
customer_reviews.author: Puddin1950

customer_reviews.title: GET IT GIRL!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this along with MAC & a few others at the same time to see which I liked best... hands down THIS one wins
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super fabulous tinted shine
customer_reviews.text: I recieved this product super fast, its got a super lustrious shine which i love about this product, it is not sticky like most are, and the tint of coral could not be more perfect, i do love this item and i am absolutely going to buy more so i do not run out, it is my lip color from now on, try it i promise you will give it a 5 star, it is exactly what it says it is Thanks Revlon great product truly
customer_reviews.author: Sheri Odell66

customer_reviews.title: Great for any occasion!
customer_reviews.text: The subtle color and shimmer are great for any occasion. Easy to apply and goes with everything. The price point really makes it a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Tj Guinard

customer_reviews.title: Love...love...love!
customer_reviews.text: My wife absolutely loves this lip-gloss. She loves the moisturizing effect and sheen it has. Not so mention how succulent her lips looks when she has it on. This has been a constant commodity in her bag for about 10 years now. I always try to have a spare on hand whenever she runs out. So far Amazon has the best price compared to Walmart, drugstores and other retailers...not to mention it is usually out of stock...Snow Pink, #205.
customer_reviews.author: jamECHO

customer_reviews.title: Great consistency BUT color is off....
customer_reviews.text: This lip gloss has a great texture that feels hydrating on my lips, however, the color is much more pink than in the pic. It’s pretty, but I was looking forward to a true rose-gold, which it’s not. It also requires frequent re-applying. I will purchase other colors because I do like the consistency, and the price (for the brand) is great, but I will tread carefully when selecting colors from here on out.
customer_reviews.author: Moonfry298

customer_reviews.title: Big Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Rosy Future lip gloss before and I liked it. Unfortunately this time the product was TERRIBLE. The biggest problem is that I believe the tube arrived almost completely EMPTY. It didn't appear to have been used or tampered with, but there was definitely MUCH less lip gloss in the tube. The new, much bigger applicator is part of the problem. Very disappointing in that respect. I've also decided that the Revlon luminous lip glosses are too shiny - looks like glitter on your lips.
customer_reviews.author: michele

customer_reviews.title: Fenty dupe
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I purchased this after my long search for a nice fenty gloss bomb dupe and lets just say I'm so pleasantly surprised with this item. It's such a subtle but noticeable shine and color, it adds a little rosy hue to your lips but not where it becomes overwhelming with color. This gloss can be applied over most natural lip colors and look very nice. It feels so nice on my lips, I will say it comes off a little bit on the faster side, but this can also be because I've worn while eating and drinking so I guess in retrospect it holds pretty well. This is my got to everyday gloss.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Glossy and shimmery- provides no moisture
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this product before- it’s very shimmery and pretty. I apply it over Revlon’s “cherish” shade lip balm stick. It’s one of the best pink combinations- however Revlon’s “pink cloud” in lipstick form is still, in my opinion, a better shade and lasts longer than this gloss.
customer_reviews.author: your friend

customer_reviews.title: Glossy.
customer_reviews.text: I like the hint of colour. I chose the wrong colour though. Wanted to enhance my lip colour, instead this one tones it down, so, I use it over red lipstick I want to tone down. It did a great job at that.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Just a very personal view
customer_reviews.text: This gloss didn't work for me at all. It didn't feel pleasant, leave color, or last past a half hour. I very seldom use gloss but often use lip balms such as Burt's Bees so that my experience and expectation are quite different and the rating is true for me but probably unfair for others
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Very sheer with a lovely sheen
customer_reviews.text: The formula isn't too sticky, with a nice amount of shine. The color is very sheer on my lips, but I'm a rich tan complexion. There might be more color on a lighter person.
customer_reviews.author: Helen K.

customer_reviews.title: Works over liquid lipstick
customer_reviews.text: This is such a good product! Used it over liquid lipstick and it didn't ruin it! Glossy, stays on for probably 2-3 hours when not eating or drinking. Very thick gloss, which actually isn't unpleasant. It feels moisturizing, and while a bit sticky, isn't completely tacky.
customer_reviews.author: Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Cute everyday gloss
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously my favorite lipstick lately. It's sort of nude but I'm the most flattering way. I'm super picky about lipstick and glosses but other than not lasting a long time which is not really I'm the nature of most glosses I love it.
customer_reviews.author: WiseSnapple

customer_reviews.title: It's my favorite lip gloss
customer_reviews.text: I have reordered this many times. It's my favorite lip gloss. It's like a baby pink with lots of shine! It's not long wearing, you need to reapply often which doesn't bother me. Worth every penny😁
customer_reviews.author: KMC

customer_reviews.title: Finally found it!!
customer_reviews.text: The lip gloss is perfect, moisturizing, long lasting, and delicate flavor. This is the hardest color to find in this brand. It is almost always sold out in every drug and beauty store. I found it on Amazon and it is a lot cheaper in price which is great!
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: Subtle glitter
customer_reviews.text: Nice and big applicator, feels nice on. I would say it’s more of a clear. Glitter is very subtle. If you want just a subtle glitter gloss, this is it. I wanted the glitter to show a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: Cristina Torres

customer_reviews.title: Very nice glass
customer_reviews.text: I like this gloss. I’ve bought several colors and I’ve enjoyed them all. This is a nice thick pretty gloss. I do have to reapply it after a few hours but I think all glosses are pretty much that way. All the shades are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: C. WallaceTop Contributor: Eye Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Not Like the old brand
customer_reviews.text: Can't compare to the old Revlon Super Lustrous Lip Gloss that they apparently are no longer selling. This makes a horrible mess when you take the wand out of the tube. Finally bought and found my old brand that I loved.
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: Sugar violet
customer_reviews.text: The color is pretty and I love the sparkles. The applicator is great the product doesn't stay on though. It was under $3 at the time I purchased it. And I just repurchased. Would recommend using this as a top coat over lipstick or Chapstick.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Great lip gloss
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect shade for me. I don't find it sticky or have a bad taste like some lip glosses do. I purchased a second shade in this line and had the same opinion with the performance of this brand. I will definitely purchase additional shades.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Stagner

customer_reviews.title: Goes on like bad house paint
customer_reviews.text: Too awful to be used, ever -- just a runny shiny slick of dark brownish purple without any depth. It really does look like bad house paint.
customer_reviews.author: NYCpower

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite lip gloss!
customer_reviews.text: Sky Pink is my new go-to lip gloss! It's not sticky or runny, it has the perfect consistency, and does stay on for a long while before needing to be reapplied. I love the light scent which smells like marshmallows, and it has a slightly sweet taste to it too.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy N

customer_reviews.title: No color. But made my lips shiny and glossy
customer_reviews.text: It did not have any color too it. It just made my lips look really shiny and glossy. Perfect for a female who doesn’t like much makeup or perfect for a girl in junior high who should not be wearing a bunch of makeup
customer_reviews.author: megan mahon

customer_reviews.title: The BEST bang for your buck!
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite! I love the applicator, texture, and the fact that it doesn’t have a taste! Also, it doesn’t spill out and get messy, which many of the expensive ones still do! I have nothing negative to say. This color is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Charlene Day

customer_reviews.title: Revlon Super Luscious Lip Gloss
customer_reviews.text: Today I received my Revlon Super Luscious lip gloss. Let my say I am extremely impressed. My lip gloss goes on smoothly is a beautiful color and keeps my lips moisturized. And the best thing of all was the price!!!, only 2$ and change.Will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Aidan

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting !Natural color.BEST PRICE!
customer_reviews.text: Been buying For years. They have gotten to such a good price I ordered five of them a time anymore and I keep one everywhere this is the best super natural color I have never come across... Long lasting!
customer_reviews.author: PATTY PITCHER

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lip gloss
customer_reviews.text: Makes my lips look bigger and plump and the color looks amazing on me
customer_reviews.author: Lani

customer_reviews.title: OH LIP GLOSS... WHERE HAVE YOU BEEN ALL MY LIFE!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a natural lip gloss color for sooo long and every one I have tried looked so weird with my skin tone (I'm hispanic), but not this Revlon Super Lustrous lip gloss in Super Natural! It is the perfect shade on me and I could not be more pleased with it. I am happy to say that the search is over for me!
customer_reviews.author: gmruiz6700

customer_reviews.title: Pretty color but lighter than expected and not exactly a ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty color but lighter than expected and not exactly a dupe for Fenty's Gloss Bomb, which is darker and warmer.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: My favorite lip gloss!
customer_reviews.text: I love this lip gloss, it is just a little color and keeps my lips moist...Not greasy like some!
customer_reviews.author: NiftyNini

customer_reviews.title: Great lasting lip gloss!
customer_reviews.text: This lip gloss is great, I love the colors and Amazon's price is half what they cost in stores.
customer_reviews.author: LEELEE

customer_reviews.text: Very tacky/sticky, didn't go on very smoothly, and didn't last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Aya

customer_reviews.title: Pretty color with a non-sticky finish!
customer_reviews.text: I recently tried this lip gloss in the "Snow Pink" color and really liked it. It has a smooth finish, without feeling sticky like many lip glosses do. The snow pink is a nice light pink that looks natural, but also has a little sparkle that makes it shimmer on your lips! It's very pretty for a casual daytime look, or could be dressed up for an evening look as well. I also loved that I didn't have to reapply it often - it stays on for a long time. Definitely looking into buying more of this gloss in the other colors :)
customer_reviews.author: Anna Hoeppner

customer_reviews.title: Not the same color
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this shade in stick form for about a dozen years now. Thought this would be the same shade but with a glossy look and it isn’t. It doesn’t have good coverage either.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi DiMarco

customer_reviews.title: Sticky!
customer_reviews.text: So I thought this was going to be non sticky, but that was not the case so I returned the item. Pretty color, natural looking but just didn't like the feel of it. Thanks anyways.
customer_reviews.author: Lama Mama

customer_reviews.title: Impressed!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first Revlon gloss purchase ever, and I'll tell you I was not disappointed! It's the perfect consistency for a gloss. And the color, looks more..natural. absolutely adore this actually!
customer_reviews.author: T.rok

customer_reviews.title: Great gloss!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered Dusk Darling - gorgeous color! I've had many colors and have loved them all! No issues with purchase or delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Bellaluna

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping it would be more opaque than it actually is. It's a pretty gloss but more sheer with little gold reflects. I'll use it to gloss up my matte lipsticks
customer_reviews.author: Tracey

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I like it too much and I order another one for my daughter I recommend the seller and the colors
customer_reviews.author: Ghada

customer_reviews.title: Ok yes!
customer_reviews.text: This is the lip gloss someone of ANY color would look good in. Get it and wear it. The covid is killing the vibe on wearing it more frequently but it’s super cute
customer_reviews.author: luvnconvenience

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff!
customer_reviews.text: This lipgloss is nice...glides on like silk and I love the color!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.Haqq

customer_reviews.title: Nice size product / Goes on really smooth
customer_reviews.text: Goes on really smooth. The tube is pretty big which is definitely a plus. Just wish it lasted a little longer. Doesn’t dry out ur lips. Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Bacallao

customer_reviews.title: This is the nicest gloss I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: It's lightweight, not at all sticky, no nasty ingredients like mineral oil or lanolin. No glitter, no shimmer, just a beautiful shine. I plan to get more shades as soon as my bank account permits it. Also, the price point is excellent. These are $8 - $9 everywhere else I've seen them.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Ethereal

customer_reviews.title: Great Lipgloss
customer_reviews.text: This lipgloss is super and I love it. I only wish that it were a little darker for my skin color. But over all, My lips are ready set go. Thanks Revlon.
customer_reviews.author: dflores

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, very soft color
customer_reviews.text: I really love this lip gloss! It doesn’t have much color but it slightly tints and gives a glossy shine. My sister LOVED this one when I gave her a makeover the other day. Might buy another one for her! I would definitely suggest this to anyone looking for a lowkey lip gloss!
customer_reviews.author: Josie Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Spiced apricot is my all time favorite it’s like an almost Rosie nude and not overpowering looking. Feels great and last for a couple hours
customer_reviews.author: Chelle

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lip gloss
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. It is comfortable and does not have a strong smell or taste.
customer_reviews.author: Minnie

customer_reviews.title: love
customer_reviews.text: it’s so glossy, not sticky at all. my lips r naturally a little dark so i love that this lightens then without being too nude-y!
customer_reviews.author: adam and dana

customer_reviews.title: No Color
customer_reviews.text: This is a high gloss however there is absolutely no color or even frosted look to it. Maybe it will work over a matte color lipstick but not what I was hoping for or the color it advertising.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very drying
customer_reviews.text: This particular color looks basically like my normal lips. After wearing it my lips got extremely dry and started peeling the next day.
customer_reviews.author: CandR

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Feels great, no flavor and lasts, I would get clear next time. The glitter was a blue tint so it won't work for daily wear. Like it though
customer_reviews.author: Lea

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: It's too sticky and not glossy as it should be! It doesn't stay more than half an hour! Disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: MY FAVORITE LIP GLOSS PERIOD
customer_reviews.text: Love This Lip Gloss Only Con Is It Doesn't Have A Scent Beautiful Rich Pink Shimmer With A Hint Of Gold Flakes I Have 4 Tubes Currently SNOW PINK😍
customer_reviews.author: JADE ALYSSE

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful lipgloss!
customer_reviews.text: This color is beautiful. It’s a wearable purple shade that doesn’t feel sticky or ball up. I definitely want more of this formula!
customer_reviews.author: MouthyMama

customer_reviews.title: Very Moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product before, it is a good moisturizer, although it doesn't stain your lips, therefore it doesn't last very long, but it is nice for just a little hint of color. Or it can be used as a top gloss product!
customer_reviews.author: v thornton

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t really stay on lips long. It’s just not as right as I hoped it would be. Very shiny that part I do like I don’t think I’d buy it again from this brand but I’m gonna use it
customer_reviews.author: Just me

customer_reviews.title: Not a Good Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This lip gloss wore off too fast. It dried my lips out and it barely last. After a while it felt like a glue residue on my lips.
customer_reviews.author: Jerrilyn Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Perfect nude non sticky lipgloss
customer_reviews.text: Love love this lipgloss. It’s not sticky and the color is so pretty. I purchased 3 tubes! One for the car, one for my purse and one for home. I never want to run out. It’s the perfect soft nude color.
customer_reviews.author: Kacey Compton

product_meta.title: Revlon Super Lustrous Lip Gloss, Super Natural
product_meta.description:
Color:Super NaturalRevlon Super Lustrous Lipgloss is a non-sticky lipgloss with moisturizing shine and a pop of sheer color. It conditions and smooths the lips while providing shiny moisture and a soft, supple feel. Available in 12 gorgeous shades, you can apply it directly to your lips for a high-shine look or layer over your favorite Revlon Super Lustrous Lipstick. Revlon is a global leader in cosmetics, hair color, fragrances, skincare, and beauty care products. One of the strongest consumer brand franchises in the world, Revlon’s products are sold in over 100 countries across six continents. Revlon revitalized the industry over the years with iconic nail and lip colors and with breakthrough technology like ColorStay transfer-resistant lipstick and makeup.

BRAND STORY
By Revlon
feature_bullets: High shine, nonsticky hydrating lip gloss
Turns out, you can have it all! This nonsticky lip gloss deposits dewy shine, decadent moisture, and all the color you crave—while it makes lips look plumper
This moisturizing lipgloss formula contains agave, moringa oil, and cupuacu butter
Choices, choices: Pick from 12 plush lip gloss shades
One swipe saturates lips in a glaze of pigment and shine. Dial things up! Layer the lip gloss over your lipstick for potent color with an intense sheen

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
